title: Inner Peace, Gut Health, and More!
description:
Jillian suggests ways to handle high frustration levels. Plus, you may have digestive issues you’re not even aware of; and questions from social media about gaining muscle and burning fat, a typical day of meals for Jillian, and more! 


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
